attributes.action: Immediately dissolve Parliament and prohibit any current MP found guilty of impropriety from standing in any future election if they are proven to have claimed expenses that break either the letter or the spirit of the rules governing such matters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
mp's have devised and used their own rules to apparently derive financial benefit for themselves whilst ensuring that ordinary citizens cannot claim the same exemptions or benefits.
These actions have brought the integrity of the house of commons and our system of government into disrepute, and as such, members must be removed from the house and prevented from standing in any future election in order for the house to regain its previous good name.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
